column1: * 1923 - J.R.R. Tolkiens review "Holy Maidenhood" is published in The Times Literary Supplement.
* 1981 - The eighth episode of The Lord of the Rings (1981 radio series) of The Lord of the Rings is aired on BBC.
* 2009 - The PC game Third Age: Total War is released.
* 2010 - Simon Tolkien publishes the article "In My Grandfathers Footsteps".
** Gandalf visits Bag End looking for somebody to take part in an adventure but Bilbo Baggins rejects the offer.
